Armor in Earth.name: Armor in Earth
Armor in Earth.description: This armor was created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.plEZoAyPwjAOdY4e]{Armor in Earth} impulse.

Effect: Ocean's Balm Immunity.name: Effect: Ocean's Balm Immunity
Effect: Ocean's Balm Immunity.description: You are immune to healing from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.1gtWb6lKWMw1Wp1q]{Ocean's Balm}.

Effect: Protector Tree.name: Effect: Protector Tree
Effect: Protector Tree.description: Whenever an adjacent ally is hit by a Strike, the tree interposes its branch and takes the damage first. Any additional damage beyond what it takes to reduce the tree to 0 Hit Points is dealt to the original target.

Effect: Thermal Nimbus Damage.name: Effect: Thermal Nimbus Damage
Effect: Thermal Nimbus Damage.description: You are inside a Kineticist's Thermal Nimbus aura.

Effect: Torrent in the Blood Immunity.name: Effect: Torrent in the Blood Immunity
Effect: Torrent in the Blood Immunity.description: You are immune to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.ijsMs8iv9AsHQWrv]{Torrent in the Blood}.

Fresh Produce.name: Fresh Produce
Fresh Produce.description:
This has been created by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.IcAEMf94XoTvtzAO]{Fresh Produce}. You can eat it with an Interact action to regain @Damage[((floor((max(1,@item.level)-1)/2)+1)d4+(floor((max(1,@item.level)-1)/2)*5+1))[vitality,healing]] HP; this is a healing vitality effect. You feel full for 10 minutes, during which you have resistance to void damage and can't eat another piece of produce.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.2GWZgsvMJF9DN0DO]{Effect: Fresh Produce}

Hardwood Armor.name: Hardwood Armor
Hardwood Armor.description:
This armor was created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.cZa6br5C3Iyzqqi9]{Hardwood Armor} impulse.

Wood and bark grow over your body like armor.

Hardwood Shield.name: Hardwood Shield
Hardwood Shield.description:
This shield was created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.cZa6br5C3Iyzqqi9]{Hardwood Armor} impulse.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.classfeatures.eZNCckLzbH3GyncH]{Shield Block} with this shield even if you don't have that feat. The hand wielding this shield counts as a free hand for using impulses. The shield decays in an instant if it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} or leaves your grasp.

HardnessHPBT
3126

Metal Carapace.name: Metal Carapace
Metal Carapace.description:
This armor was created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HbdOZ8YTtu8ykASc]{Metal Carapace} impulse.

Sheets of bend and rusted metal cover you in an armored shell.

The metal is rusted and fragile. If you take damage from a critical hit, the metal shatters and the impulse ends.

Metal Carapace Shield.name: Metal Carapace Shield
Metal Carapace Shield.description:
This shield was created by the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.HbdOZ8YTtu8ykASc]{Metal Carapace} impulse.

You can @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} with this shield even if you don't have that feat. The hand wielding this shield counts as a free hand for using impulses. The shield crumbles to flakes of rust if it becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken} or leaves your grasp.

HardnessHPBT
52010
